DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the impact and outcome of continuous volatile anesthesia to continuous intravenous anesthesia and to preconditioning volatile anesthesia in liver surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Preconditioning Volatile Anesthesia in Liver Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Comparing the impact and outcome of continuous volatile anesthesia to continuous intravenous anesthesia and to preconditioning volatile anesthesia in liver surgery.
DOC.criteria: > 18 years benign and malign disease any type of liver surgery inflow occlusion during the liver surgery < 18 years participation on other interventional and treatment randomized controlled trials, trauma of the liver liver cirrhosis
DOC.keyword: Comparing three groups of anesthesia during the liver surgery according to their benefit on liver and outcome.
